doc.after: Shakespeare s work has made a lasting impression on later theatre and literature In particular he expanded the dramatic potential of characterisation plot language and genre 157 Until Romeo and Juliet for example romance had not been viewed as a worthy topic for tragedy 158 Soliloquies had been used mainly to convey information about characters or events but Shakespeare used them to explore characters minds 159 His work heavily influenced later poetry The Romantic poets attempted to revive Shakespearean verse drama though with little success Critic George Steiner described all English verse dramas from Coleridge to Tennyson as feeble variations on Shakespearean themes 160
